Text: Hey guys.Tanauser or anyone can tell me if first this blood pack is compatible with the S2 FOTS and if this is compatible and its the same instuctions to make it work like S2.?It happens that i have a Retail version of the game FOTS but i am now kinda broke and i can't aford to buy the blood pack from steam and i even not use a credit card.!??So if its not compatible Tanauser mate can u upload the blood pack that works with the FOTS.???Btw i tried this to FOTS and it did not work no blood-gore and stuff and it gave me some problems to the game.!
